episodes.description: Early in the pandemic, NHK asked people around the world to share stories of their communities using selfie videos. Despite their plight, they sought to comfort each other with messages of hope.
episodes.subtitle: Episode 1: World Under Lockdown
episodes.title: We're in This Together

episodes.description: COVID-19 has taken a higher toll among the poor and people of color. Many have responded with anger and rage. But some local leaders are working to channel those emotions into positive action.
episodes.subtitle: Episode 2: Disparities and Hope
episodes.title: We're in This Together
